meanings.definition: Below the level necessary for effective treatment.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a subtherapeutic dose of medication for the patient.
meanings.sent2: The subtherapeutic amount of medicine was not enough to help the illness.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bandage was so subtherapeutic that it couldn't even cover the small cut.
meanings.sent4: Her subtherapeutic efforts to study for the exam were like trying to fill a bucket with a teaspoon.
meanings.sent5: The subtherapeutic treatment left the patient feeling worse than before.

meanings.definition: Insufficient to produce a therapeutic effect.
meanings.sent1: The subtherapeutic dosage of the painkiller did not relieve her headache.
meanings.sent2: The subtherapeutic level of exercise was not enough to improve his health.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to fix the leak with a subtherapeutic amount of glue was unsuccessful.
meanings.sent4: The subtherapeutic dose of motivation was not strong enough to get her out of bed.
meanings.sent5: The subtherapeutic treatment failed to provide any relief for the patient's symptoms.
